Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Globular bottle
Description: Globular bottle with narrow mouth, straight rounded rim and short bottleneck with flared walls. Unstable base with flat bottom. Paste and surface of a reddish colour, the latter covered with a coating of the same colour. Beneath the bottleneck and in the middle part of the body is a painted decoration: a double line encircling the piece in wine-red.
